alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 19 at 9:56AM PST until December 21 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Anatone, Peola, Mountain Road, and Cloverland Road. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of moderate to heavy snow will be possible Tuesday evening and night impacting the Tuesday evening commute.
